verbs.description: The top media stories in Paganism and Shinto for Apr 16th- 22nd : [ARG0: Patheos ' Friendly Atheist] [V: reports] [ARG1: on the evangelical Christian group “ POTUS Shield , ” who are holding a collective prayer to protect Donald Trump from “ witches and warlocks] . ” Plus : The huge Takamikura thrown of the Japanese Emperor , designed to represent key episodes in Shinto mythology , will be moved from Kyoto to Tokyo ahead of the next Emperor 's accession .
